//ALOK SHARMA

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define i64 long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define DBG(vari) cerr<<#vari<<" ==> "<<(vari)<<endl
#define inf 2000000000

typedef pair<i64,i64> pll;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}

int main()
{
    //freopen("aain.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("aaout.txt","w",stdout);
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	int t,a[125],b[125],tt=1;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int k;
		cin>>k;
		for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
		cin>>b[i];
		sort(a,a+k);
		sort(b,b+k);
		int ans=0;
		for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
		ans+=abs(a[i]-b[i]);
		cout<<"Case "<<tt<<": "<<ans<<endl;
		tt++;
	}
	return 0;     
}
